meanings.definition: A person who shares an interest or passion with others in the same activity or hobby.
meanings.sent1: At the coin collecting club, the coinsurers gathered to discuss their latest acquisitions.
meanings.sent2: The coinsurers at the stamp collecting convention exchanged tips on rare finds.
meanings.sent3: The coinsurers at the knitting circle were all tangled up in yarn mishaps.
meanings.sent4: The coinsurers in the gardening group bloomed with excitement over their flourishing plants.
meanings.sent5: The coinsurers in the book club were avid readers who shared a love for literature.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who jointly insure against a risk.
meanings.sent1: The coinsurers pooled their resources to protect against unexpected losses.
meanings.sent2: The coinsurers in the insurance company spread the risk among themselves.
meanings.sent3: The coinsurers in the partnership insured their antique collection against theft.
meanings.sent4: The coinsurers in the cooperative shared the burden of potential damages.
meanings.sent5: The coinsurers in the alliance safeguarded their assets through mutual protection.
